data.name: Lighthaze World
data.detailed_description:
You are about to play as Nym, an anxious guy that is trying to overcome his fear of crowds and go shopping at the mall. You will help other characters along the way with your ability to solve puzzles that nobody else can understand. The puzzles are in the form of push box, environmental, button sequence, mirror and activation puzzles.

The Lighthaze World Mall lets Nym transport himself to different worlds. These worlds are all hand designed lush environments. So you the player will be able to relax and enjoy a casual puzzle game like no other.

data.short_description: Welcome to Lighthaze World, a mall full of puzzles and intrigue. At the heart of this casual adventure game is the story of an anxious hero finding a path to solve the day.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible, 256 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible
  • Additional Notes: Even slower systems may run the game
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible, 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible
  • Additional Notes: Even slower systems run the game.
